channel.title: Hyperion - Perfect OldSchool Base [RE-MADE SOME THINGS]
channel.description:
[center]Well, i was working on this one a little bit, just continueing on some various skills and features, Was going to use it as my own base, but i couldn't be bothered.[/center]
[left]What i've fixed in this Server:
[ul][li]Fixed Lever Animations (Ardy Lever)[/li] [li]Proper Web Slashing (Mage Bank / Ardy Lever Webs)[/li] [li]LockPicks (With Working Axe Hut / Pirates Hut)[/li] [li]Continued on Mining / Thieving[/li] [li]Fixed some missing Mapdata[/li] [li]Fixed Proper Timers (Levering, Hits, Specs & Magic)[/li] [li]Some more fixes i cannot remember right now..[/li][/ul]
[/left]
[center][b]ORIGINAL POST[/b]
Here's a server I worked a while ago on and then quit, its based off of canownueazy's iServer. Features: (Either already implemented or coded by me)[/center] [left] [ul][li]Decent combat base:[/li] [list] [li]Melee: Perfect maxhit, weapon timers, special attacks[/li] [li]Range: Perfect maxhit, every bow+arrow type, special attacks, arrows drop on ground[/li] [li]Magic: Normal spells up to bolts + Ancient ice spells (Easy to add rest)[/li] [li]Food and potions work[/li] [li]Wilderness fully working (lvl 23 coords: 3200, 3800)[/li] [/list] [li]Decent skill system[/li] [list] [li]Firemaking base[/li] [li]Woodcutting base[/li] [li]Mining/Prospecting base[/li] [li]Thieving (stalls and npc) base[/li] [/list] [li]Fight caves minigame[/li] [li]Start of cook's assistant[/li] [li]Following system[/li] [li]Door + ladder system[/li] [li]Jagcached client + RSA encrypted (Means that you don't need to download full cache before playing)[/li][/ul] [/left]
[center]The server basically has a model for everything you wish to add (combat, skills, minigames, quests) [b]Notes:[/b] - Server/data/constants.cfg contains server name, owner name, and xp rate - Server has to be online for client to connect - I've included a magic.cfg file with rest of proj. ids for normal magic, should be easy to figure out how to add rest
Download link (Client + Server): [url=http://uppit.com/cwgku8y9vrsn/Hyperion.7z]UppIT - Free File Sharing - Hyperion.7z[/url]
Credits: - Original hyperion team (Graham, Blake, BrettR), [B]Scu11[/B], Canownueazy, Russian
Ice blitz + Dds combat [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/1pxy07.png[/img]
Jagcached ondemand loading [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/x6k6jr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/combatpre.gif[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/magemeleecombo.gif[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/magicshort.gif[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/mageshortbowspec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/rangedefemotes.gif[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/gmaul.gif[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/proladders.gif[/img][/center]

Gud work

He leeched: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470958.msg3444135.html#msg3444135

EDIT : Read it, you probably leeched it anyway, like you leeched his pictures.

How did i Leech his Pictures,
When i clearly wrote ORIGINAL POST above ?

You’re retarded.

Use your own pictures and don’t release this without changing it significantly. That is leeching.
[/quote]

So you don’t think i should release this,
When i’ve worked on the Skills, Improved things, added things and features, fixed mapdata etc?

Idiot.[/quote]
Then stop being a lazy cunt and work on it some more. I don’t release all my failed projects, why should you.
